ToolTips.BIGRAM: Unique identifier for customer, should be defined according to standard (see systemdoc)
ToolTips.InstallMode: Install online or offline. If online : "PROD" or "TEST". Downloads from production or testa area. If offline: "LOCAL". No download. Download is done by VPBSDownload previous to install.
ToolTips.InstanceName: All non multitenant apps is installed under this instancename (default same as BIGRAM), it is a part of the url to applications (https://FQDN/INSTANCENAME/APPLICATIONNAME)
ToolTips.InstanceID: Autogenerated ID for instance, DO NOT SET THIS!!!
ToolTips.LocalComputerName: The local computername, used for creating users/groups etc.
ToolTips.RootDrive: Installation Root drive (do not use C:\)
ToolTips.NeptuneConnectionName: Neptune connection name for instance (used in NeptuneConfiguration.xml)
ToolTips.DatabaseServerUser: User with sysadmin privileges in SQLServer, used to create and update databases
ToolTips.DatabaseServerUserPassword: Password for sysadmin DB user (user that is used to create and update databases)
ToolTips.CommonStorageURL: FQDN to commonstorage webservice (default localhost) should only be changed if applications are not installed on foundation server
ToolTips.CommonStorageToolPath: Path to Common Storage import tool
ToolTips.NeptuneDatabaseUserPassword: Password for Neptune SQLServer database user
ToolTips.NeptuneMessageBrokerUser: Neptune user for Messagebroker (be sure to create a separate Neptune user ex. MsgBroker)
ToolTips.IISSiteName: Website name to install applications to
ToolTips.IISSiteID: Website ID to install applications to (is set when configuring "IISSiteName")
ToolTips.IISSiteProtocol: Portnumber of http protocol (should always be 443 (https))
ToolTips.VismaWindowCertificate: Certificate used for authentication between Visma Window Login and applications
ToolTips.ClientURL: Client url to this webserver (FQDN without protocol)
ToolTips.InstallDir: The installation root directory (Autogenerated , do not change!!)
ToolTips.Transforms: Instance specific ID. (Do not change this!!!!)
ToolTips.MSINewInstance: Instance constant that always should be set to: 1
ToolTips.SecurityServicesPath: FQDN to Neptune securityservices (Authentication and Authorization, default localhost and should only be changed if applications are not installed on foundation server
ToolTips.SecurityServicesUserDomain: Server local name for server where securityservices (Authentication and Authorization) is installed
ToolTips.SecurityServicesUser: User for securityservices (Authentication and Authorization) application pool. Should always be INSTANCENAME_Sec. If application that uses securityservcices is installed on another server (not the foundation server) a local account with the same name as on the server that hosts SecurityServices must be created
ToolTips.SecurityServicesUserPassword: Password for User of securityservices (Authentication and Authorization) application pool. If application that uses securityservcices is installed on another server (not the foundation server) a local account with the same name and password as on the server that hosts SecurityServices must be created
ToolTips.SchedulerPath: FQDN to Scheduler webservice (default localhost) should only be changed if application that uses Scheduler services is installed on another server
ToolTips.RestrictedInstallApps: Applications separated by semicolon ; is the only apps listed in application lists

ToolTips.ProductName: Application product name (Do not change this!)
ToolTips.MultitenantMode: Is this application in multitenant mode
ToolTips.UseCommonStorage: Should this application use CommonStorage database
ToolTips.TenantIdSource: Specify mode for multitenancy (only used when in multitenantmode)
ToolTips.SettingsCacheIntervalInMinutes: Interval in m inutes for CommonStorage services
ToolTips.DefaultApplicationUrl: Static retúrn value (do not change this)
ToolTips.UseIDPEditor: If true no import to CommonStorage (SSO) will be done when installing Login component. All settings for SSO needs configuration with IPDEditor
ToolTips.UseSso: click here to set SSO settings
ToolTips.SingleSignOnMethod: Method for SSO SAML2 id default when using federation as SSO method (recommended method)
ToolTips.NeptuneScriptfilesFolder: Folder where Neptune scripts for application is stored
ToolTips.Encryption: Set this to true if config files should be encrypted
ToolTips.LogPath: Where to store application install logfile
ToolTips.RunNeptuneScripts: Set to true if Neptune script should be imported when installing application
ToolTips.IsRedirectValidationEnabled: Default set to True. Forces Login to validate WIF redirects with configured applications in menu
ToolTips.RedirectValidationUrl: Menu url where redirects are validated.

ToolTips.APP_SYSUSER: Neptune account for running the hosted web services. Doesn't need any rights - just a valid Neptune account.

ToolTips.APP_ODBCSOURCE: Name of the ODBC-source in the ODBC-administrator.
ToolTips.APP_FDN_URL: Foundation server FQDN without protocol etc.

ToolTips.CSBHost: Visma internal. Leave blank unless otherwise instructed!
ToolTips.CSBPort: Visma internal. Leave blank unless otherwise instructed!
